Customizing the Chart Window

Note: This topic is applicable to charting in the Windows client only.

You can customize the appearance of the Chart window by displaying or hiding the palette bar or pattern bar, moving the Chart window toolbar, or changing the style of the Chart window toolbar help.

To display or hide the Palette or Pattern bar:

  1. Click the Tools button on the Chart window toolbar.

  2. Select the Pattern Bar and/or the Palette Bar. If you display both bars, they share the same horizontal position on the screen.

To move the Chart window toolbar:

  1. Drag the toolbar to any location on the screen. As you drag the toolbar, its dotted outline changes to show where it would be positioned if you dropped it.

  2. If you move the toolbar to the edge of a window, it docks there. Otherwise, the toolbar floats, and you can move and resize it as a window.

To change the style of Chart window toolbar help:

  1. Right-click the border of the Chart window toolbar to display the context menu.

  2. Select Balloon tooltips to see the toolbar help in a balloon, Standard tooltips to see the help in a rectangle, or No tooltips to see no toolbar help.
